  • Constructor Details

    • Builder

      public Builder(String name, int size)
      Constructor for the Builder class.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the display.
      size - Size of the display (only works in powers of 9, e.g. 9, 18, 27, etc.).

    • Builder

      public Builder(Function<DisplayContext,String> nameFunction, int size)
      Constructor for the Builder class.
      Parameters:
      nameFunction - Name function for the display, e.g. player -> player.getName will make the display the players name.
      size - Size of the display (only works in powers of 9, e.g. 9, 18, 28, etc.).

      public Display.Builder setItemSlot(int slot, Function<DisplayContext,org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> itemFunction)
      Sets an item in a slot without having to use an interactable. But using an item function instead to be more flexible.

    • setSyncedSession

      public Display.Builder setSyncedSession(SyncedSession syncedSession)
      Adds a SyncedSession object to the display. Allowing users to customize how displays function between different players.
      Parameters:
      syncedSession - The object that handles sessions between multiple players.
